name: Solas and the White Winter
description: "Unlock the tomb and break the cycle.." Solas and the White Winter takes place in a hostile and mysterious land. You play as Solas; a young but determined girl who finds herself locked in a desperate situation.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Sp2+ Processor: 2.4GHz CPU Dual Core Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 750 / Radeon R7 260X with 1GB Memory Storage: 8 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
